title: Asset Forex News
text: EUR/USD keeps its bearish tone well and sound for yet another day on Wednesday, breaching below the 1.1500 contention zone on the back of further gains in the US Dollar. The move higher in the Greenback follows the better-than-expected ADP data and a firm flash Q2 GDP figures.

title: Asset Forex News

title: Asset Forex News
text: Gold is finally showing some signs of life, reversing four consecutive daily declines, while the recovery seems to have met some resistance around the $3,330 mark per troy ounce on Tuesday. Fading optimism on the trade front and prudence ahead of the Fed’s interest rate decision and the release of Friday’s NFP lend some legs to the precious metal.
